Posts.Content: My father-in-law was diagnosed with cancer. And his radiation treatments were going at Advanced Radiation Center of New York www.advancedradiationcenters.com . They used to call him for radiation 4 times in a week..
Posts.Title: how frequent is the radiation treatment

Posts.Content: I am getting a feeling of dejavoo by reading your post. Similar thing happend with me too. We are in the sailing in the same ship.
